response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $15,000. To ensure a fair transaction, I am offering this remarkable product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my goal of maximizing profit, while still offering you a significant discount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this beneficial exchange.", "product_price": 12000}
